mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.SELECTCOUNT, B.STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(B.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_TYPE='BT1' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_TYPE, B.SELECTCOUNT, B.STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON(B.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND B.BOARD_TYPE='BT1' AND B.BOARD_NO = #{bid} ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC
